text: 2005 research on #Chloroquine's effects on SARS-1 (that caused 2003 epidemic) [#Covid19 is #SARS_COV_2 / #SARSCoV2] infected primate cells, titled: "Chloroquine is a potent inhibitor of SARS coronavirus infection and spread" by Dr. Martin J. Vincent et al. VIROLOGY JOURNAL 2005 https://t.co/kdEFBPhkUg
